title: Kangaroo
questText: You feel the urge to jump jump jump around!

title: Communing with the Giants
questText: Ever heard of the 11 Giants? They love it when you donate stuff to them. Why don't you see if you can get a token of gratitude from one of them?
completionText: Wow, they must sure appreciate that stuff you donated.

requirements.text: Gain an emblem from one of the Giants
